abstract: Hoping to establish a stronger foothold in the oil-rich region, Citigroup is sending Alberto J. Verme, a co-head of investment banking, to Dubai by the end of the month.
snippet: Hoping to establish a stronger foothold in the oil-rich region, Citigroup is sending Alberto J. Verme, a co-head of investment banking, to Dubai by the end of the month.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup announced late Wednesday that it was moving one of its most senior investment bankers to the Middle East, hoping to establish a stronger foothold in the oil-rich region.

headline.main: Citi to Send a Top Banker to Dubai
headline.print_headline: Citi to Send A Top Banker To Dubai
